title: Mark Hopley
text:
Mark Hopley (born in <a href="Crewe">Crewe</a>, <a href="England">England</a>) was a <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player for <a href="Northampton%20Saints">Northampton Saints</a> in the <a href="Guinness%20Premiership">Guinness Premiership</a>. He played as a <a href="Flanker%20%28rugby%20union%29">flanker</a> and started his playing career at <a href="Whitchurch%20Rugby%20Club">Whitchurch Rugby Club</a> in <a href="Shropshire">Shropshire</a>. Like his fellow Northampton team mate <a href="Ben%20Foden">Ben Foden</a>, he was educated at <a href="Bishop%20Heber%20High%20School">Bishop Heber High School</a> in <a href="Malpas%2C%20Cheshire">Malpas, Cheshire</a>.
He is tall and weighs 
He made his debut for Northampton Saints in 2005 against <a href="Newcastle%20Falcons">Newcastle Falcons</a> but really started to shine in the 2007/8 season where he dominated the <a href="Rugby%20union%20positions%238.%20Number%20Eight">number 8</a> shirt. He made 21 appearances and scored 3 <a href="Try%20%28rugby%29">tries</a>.
He is now the Saints Academy coach, working alongside the other coaches in developing local talent.
